segments.text: We're going to discuss how to market CB series soon . Does your project go well ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Absolutely . I've sorted out all the materials we need and sifted three great ways of marketing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can discuss them detailedly over the meeting and choose the best way to promote our key products .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It seems you've got everything done . Now I can finally stop worrying about it and get back to work .
segments.speaker: S1
